languages.text: "Что я вижу? Все же примадонне передали мой подарок. Хорошо. По крайней мере, не все мон-кай бесполезны". {n}Арлекин звонко смеется и обнажает оружие.{/n} "Танцуй же, танцуй, трехокая!"

traits.locale_text: "Что я вижу? Все же примадонне передали мой подарок. Хорошо. По крайней мере, не все мон-кай бесполезны". {n}Арлекин звонко смеется и обнажает оружие.{/n} "Танцуй же, танцуй, трехокая!"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "What's this I am seeing? Our leading lady did receive my gift, after all. Good. At least not all mon-keigh are without use." {n}The Harlequin laughs and draws his weapon.{/n} "Dance, then! Dance, three-eyed one!"
languages.original_text: "Что я вижу? Все же примадонне передали мой подарок. Хорошо. По крайней мере, не все мон-кай бесполезны". {n}Арлекин звонко смеется и обнажает оружие.{/n} "Танцуй же, танцуй, трехокая!"

traits.locale_text: "What's this I see? Our star did receive my gift after all. Good. At least not all mon-keigh are without use." {n}The Harlequin laughs and draws his weapon.{/n} "Dance, then! Dance, three-eyed one!"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "What's this I see? Our star did receive my gift after all. Good. At least not all mon-keigh are without use." {n}The Harlequin laughs and draws his weapon.{/n} "Dance, then! Dance, three-eyed one!"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "What's this I am seeing? Our star did receive my gift, after all. Good. At least not all mon-keigh are without use." {n}The Harlequin laughs and draws his weapon.{/n} "Dance, then! Dance, three-eyed one!"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "What's this I am seeing? Our star did receive my gift, after all. Good. At least not all mon-keigh are without use." {n}The Harlequin laughs and draws his weapon.{/n} "Dance, then! Dance, three-eyed one!"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "What's this I am seeing? Our leading lady did receive my gift, after all. Good. At least not all mon-keigh are without use." {n}The Harlequin laughs and draws his weapon.{/n} "Dance, then! Dance, three-eyed one!"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "What's this I am seeing? Our leading lady did receive my gift, after all. Good. At least not all mon-keigh are without use." {n}The Harlequin laughs and draws his weapon.{/n} "Dance, then! Dance, three-eyed one!"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: 「僕が見てるこれかい？僕らの主演女優に贈り物を受け取ってもらっただけだよ。良いね。少なくとも、すべてのモン＝ケイが使ってないわけじゃないのか」{n}ハーレクィンは得物を抜く。{/n}「さあ踊れ！踊れよ、三つ目のモン＝ケイ！」
languages.original_text: "What's this I am seeing? Our leading lady did receive my gift, after all. Good. At least not all mon-keigh are without use." {n}The Harlequin laughs and draws his weapon.{/n} "Dance, then! Dance, three-eyed one!"

traits.locale_text: 「僕が見てるこれかい？僕らの主演女優に贈り物を受け取ってもらっただけだよ。良いね。少なくとも、すべてのモン＝ケイが使ってないわけじゃないのか」{n}ハーレクィンは得物を抜く。{/n}「さあ踊れ！踊れよ、三つ目のモン＝ケイ！」
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: “我看到了什么啊？我们的女主角终究还是收到了我的礼物。很好，看来并不是所有猴子都毫无用处。”{n}丑角大笑着，拔出了武器。{/n}“来跳舞吧！翩翩起舞吧，三眼之人！”
languages.original_text: "What's this I am seeing? Our leading lady did receive my gift, after all. Good. At least not all mon-keigh are without use." {n}The Harlequin laughs and draws his weapon.{/n} "Dance, then! Dance, three-eyed one!"

traits.locale_text: “看看我看到了什么啊？我们的星辰终究还是收到了我的礼物。很好，看来并不是所有猴子都毫无用处。”{n}丑角大笑着，拔出了武器。{/n}“来跳舞吧！翩翩起舞吧，三眼之人！”
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: « Mais que vois-je ? Notre étoile avait bien reçu mon cadeau, finalement. Tant mieux. Certains mon-keigh ont donc leur utilité, » {n}ajoute l'Arlequin en gloussant avant de dégainer son arme.{/n} « Alors, dansez ! Dansez, mon-keigh à trois yeux ! »
languages.original_text: "What's this I am seeing? Our leading lady did receive my gift, after all. Good. At least not all mon-keigh are without use." {n}The Harlequin laughs and draws his weapon.{/n} "Dance, then! Dance, three-eyed one!"

traits.locale_text: « Mais que vois-je ? Notre étoile avait bien reçu mon cadeau, finalement. Tant mieux. Certains mon-keigh ont donc leur utilité, » {n}ajoute l'arlequin en gloussant avant de dégainer son arme.{/n} « Alors, dansez ! Dansez, mon-keigh à trois yeux ! »
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: «¿Qué ven mis ojos? Nuestra líder recibió mi regalo, después de todo. Bien. Parece que no todos los mon-keigh son inútiles». {n}El Arlequín se ríe y desenfunda su arma.{/n} «¡Baila, pues! ¡Baila, mon-keigh de tres ojos!».
languages.original_text: "What's this I am seeing? Our leading lady did receive my gift, after all. Good. At least not all mon-keigh are without use." {n}The Harlequin laughs and draws his weapon.{/n} "Dance, then! Dance, three-eyed one!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué ven mis ojos? Nuestra estrella recibió mi regalo, después de todo. Bien. Parece que no todos los mon-keigh son inútiles». {n}El Arlequín se ríe y desenfunda su arma.{/n} «¡Baila, pues! ¡Baila, mon-keigh de tres ojos!».
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Was sehen meine Augen da? Unsere Hauptdarstellerin hat mein Geschenk also doch erhalten. Gut. Zumindest sind nicht alle Chem-Pan-Sey nutzlos." {n}Der Harlekin lacht und zieht seine Waffe.{/n} "Dann tanzt! Tanzt, Dreiauge!"
languages.original_text: "What's this I am seeing? Our leading lady did receive my gift, after all. Good. At least not all mon-keigh are without use." {n}The Harlequin laughs and draws his weapon.{/n} "Dance, then! Dance, three-eyed one!"

traits.locale_text: "Was sehen meine Augen da? Unser Star hat mein Geschenk also doch erhalten. Gut. Zumindest sind nicht alle Chem-Pan-Sey nutzlos." {n}Der Harlekin lacht und zieht seine Waffe.{/n} "Dann tanzt! Tanzt, Dreiauge!"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Gözlerim doğru mu görüyor? Baş aktrisimiz hediyemi alabilmiş. Güzel. En azından bazı mon-keighler bir işe yarayabiliyor." {n}Arleken gülüp silahını çekiyor.{/n} "Dans et bakalım! Dans et üç gözlü!"
languages.original_text: "What's this I am seeing? Our leading lady did receive my gift, after all. Good. At least not all mon-keigh are without use." {n}The Harlequin laughs and draws his weapon.{/n} "Dance, then! Dance, three-eyed one!"

traits.locale_text: "Gözlerim doğru mu görüyor? Meğer baş aktrisimiz hediyemi alabilmiş. Güzel. En azından bazı mon-keighler bir işe yarayabiliyor." {n}Arleken gülüp silahını çekiyor.{/n} "Dans et o hâlde! Dans et bakalım üç gözlü!"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
